content:
Create a Custom Style for a FlexCard Element

Save style settings on a FlexCard element as a Custom Style to use on multiple elements on your FlexCard. For example, apply the same font color, font size, text color, and background color to multiple Field elements by creating a Custom Style called blue-field-scheme.

The Custom Style feature saves any settings configured in the Style panel, including classes, inline styles, widths, and responsiveness.

To create a custom style:

1. Select an element from a state in the FlexCard Designer.
2. Click Style to open the Style panel.
3. Style the element as needed.
4. From the Custom Styles section, click the down arrow, and select Save As.
5. Enter a style name in the Enter Style Name field.
6. Click Save.

To apply a custom style:

1. Select an element on the canvas.
2. Click Style to open the Style panel.
3. Click the Select Saved Style search icon.
4. In the Select Saved Styles modal, click on the name of a style under Select Style.
5. View how your applied style will look in the Preview section of the modal.
6. Click Save.

FlexCards Custom Styles Properties

Custom Styles properties are configurable in the Style panel when you select an element in the FlexCard Designer.
title: Customizing FlexCards Styles
